title: S5 Ep57: Backstage at BAM19: AI, robots and platform workers
itunes:title: Backstage at BAM19: AI, robots and platform workers
description: Will increasing use of AI, machine learning, robots and big data lead to massive unemployment? How are non-traditional workers and the self-employed to obtain health insurance and pensions? What role should public policy play going forward? In this podcast, Giuseppe Porcaro discusses the future of AI, robots and platform workers, with J. Scott Marcus.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
